DOC.brief_summary: To explore the effect of heating precondition of epidural catheter on the incidence of injury to blood vessel during epidural catheter placement.
DOC.brief_title: Heating Precondition of Epidural Catheter Decrease the Incidence of Injury to Blood Vessel During Epidural Catheter Placement
DOC.criteria: Elective cesarean delivery Epidural anesthesia. blood coagulation disorders
